product.cushioning: Luxurious Memory Foam insole molds to the foot for plush, customized, all-day comfort.
product.breathability: Breathable mesh upper promotes good airflow, enhanced by the sock-like fit.
product.short_description: Experience the ultimate in easy-wearing comfort with the Skechers Women's Summits Sneaker. Designed for the active woman who values convenience and all-day cushioning, these slip-on athletic sneakers are a game-changer for your daily routine. The shoe features a breathable mesh upper that flexes with your foot, providing a comfortable, sock-like fit that's perfect for wearing with or without socks. The innovative slip-on design with a stretch-lace front allows for effortless on-and-off access while ensuring a secure, personalized fit. Inside, the luxurious Memory Foam insole molds to the unique contours of your foot, delivering plush cushioning and support with every step. A durable, flexible outsole provides reliable traction. One of the standout features is that the Skechers Summits are machine washable, making them incredibly easy to keep fresh and clean. For a shoe that combines slip-on convenience, memory foam comfort, and easy-care practicality, the Skechers Summits are the perfect choice for your busy lifestyle.
product.about_this_item: ATHLETIC COMFORT DESIGN: Soft mesh knit upper with bungee lacing system... PREMIUM CUSHIONING: Memory Foam cushioned insole... VERSATILE PERFORMANCE... EASY MAINTENANCE... RELIABLE TRACTION...
product.primary_keyword: slip on sneakers for women, memory foam shoes
